name: 100 Pumpkins
description:
in 100 Pumpkins, you play a scarecrow trying to find 100 lost pumpkins. Challenging platforming and some puzzle solving with help you accomplish the task!

In an interconnected world, you'll have to find exactly 1 pumpkin per screen to finish the game.

Key features:
Simple stage layouts
Minimap showing your location and which screens are finished
A checkpoint on every screen
Cheesy, spoooooky enemies and environments
4 endings based on number of lives lost
Bosses!
